recommendations.title: High contrast lyric mode
recommendations.description: Switch lyrics to pure white (#FFFFFF) for maximum stage visibility

recommendations.title: Implement consistent chord-lyric spacing
recommendations.description: Use fixed spacing units between chord lines and lyrics for predictable scanning
recommendations.code: className='mb-8 space-y-2' // For chord section, className='mb-12' // Between verse blocks

recommendations.title: Enhanced chord visualization
recommendations.description: Create distinct visual containers for chords with background highlights and increased size for stage visibility
recommendations.code: className='inline-block bg-yellow-400 text-black px-2 py-1 rounded font-bold text-2xl mr-2'

recommendations.title: Add progress indicator bar
recommendations.description: Implement a thin progress bar at bottom showing song position for performer awareness
recommendations.code: className='fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 h-2 bg-gray-800'><div className='h-full bg-green-500 transition-all duration-300' style={{width: `${progress}%`}}

recommendations.title: Current line highlighting
recommendations.description: Add subtle background highlight to currently sung line with smooth transitions
